SetRepostThreshold(int)

Sets the repost threshold for starboard posts in the guild.

Declaration

[Aliases("SetRepostThreshold")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageChannels)]

Parameters
Type Name Description
int num

The repost threshold. Pass 0 to disable reposting.
